title.description: Title or name of the survey

nickname.description: Nickname or alias for the survey

language.description: Language in which the survey is conducted

theme_id.description: ID of the theme applied to the survey

folder_id.description: ID of the folder where the survey is stored

category.description: Category or topic of the survey

question_count.description: Total number of questions in the survey

page_count.description: Number of pages in the survey

response_count.description: Number of responses received for the survey

date_created.description: Date and time when the survey was created

date_modified.description: Date and time when the survey was last modified

buttons_text.description: Text displayed on buttons associated with the survey.

is_owner.description: Flag indicating if the user is the owner of the survey

custom_variables.description: Custom variables associated with the survey

summary_url.description: URL for viewing the summary of survey results

preview.description: Preview content or link for the survey
